info.title: Read information about a menu button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnMenuButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the menu button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the menu button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#menubutton1').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Actions' menu button, read information about the menu button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Actions' menu button, read information about the menu button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
